conbody.p: is distributed in the following packages:

li.p: Contains the software and documentation for installation and deployment in a data center. The package includes:

databases/bes_db subdirectory:
Configuration files for setting up the databases used by .
doc subdirectory:
PDF manuals providing installation and operation instructions, an overview of , and information on new features and compatibility issues when upgrading a installation.
domains/bes_domain subdirectory:
Configuration files for setting up the application server resources for the domain to which is to be deployed, as well as the archive files that make up .
domains/indexer_domain subdirectory:
Configuration files for setting up the application server resources for the domain to which the search indexer application is to be deployed, as well as the archive file that makes up the search indexer application.
install subdirectory:
XML files that support you in setting up the databases and application server resources for .
licences subdirectory:
License files of third-party software used by .
oscm-operatorclient.zip: The command line tool.
The subsequent chapters of this manual describe the installation and deployment in detail.

Contains the public Web services and application programming interfaces of , their documentation as well as additional resources, templates, samples, and utilities. Developers and technology providers can use this package for integrating applications and external systems with . This is described in detail in the Technology Provider's Guide and the Developer's Guide.

li.b: Payment Service Provider Integration Package, oscm-integration-psp-pack.zip:
li.p: Contains the public Web service interface as well as additional resources and documentation for integrating a payment service provider (PSP) with .

li.b: Integration Package for Asynchronous Provisioning, oscm-integration-app-pack.zip:
li.p: Contains the asynchronous provisioning platform (APP) as well as samples and documentation. APP is a framework which provides a provisioning service, an operation service, as well as functions, data persistence, and notification features which are always required for integrating applications with in asynchronous mode.
Contains all the components required for integrating the Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud Web service with as well as the related documentation.
Contains all the components required for integrating OpenStack services with as well as the related documentation.
Contains all the components required for integrating VMware vSphere with as well as the related documentation.
